message.content:
{"id": "124067", "title": "Bug 124067 - Relative path not supported when selecting XML file", "description": "Bug 124067 - When selecting an XML file, only the absolute path is supported. It should also support relative paths.", "OB": "When selecting the XML file, the relative path is not being used. The current behavior only supports absolute paths.", "EB": "Description: When selecting an XML file, the application should support both relative and absolute paths.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new report.
2. Select an XML file using a relative path.

Actual Result:
Only the absolute path is supported.

Expected Result:
Both the relative and absolute paths should be supported.", "SR": "Update the application to support relative paths when selecting an XML file and ensure that both relative and absolute paths are supported."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '124067', 'title': 'Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported.', 'description': 'Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported. ', 'OB': 'select the XML file, the file relative path should be used.Actual result:only the absolute path is supported.Expect result:the relative and absolute path are supported. ', 'EB': 'Description:When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported.Step to reproduce:1. new a report2. select the XML file, the file relative path should be used.Actual result:only the absolute path is supported.Expect result:the relative and absolute path are supported. ', 'SR': ''}
